storyInfo: At the scene of the conflagration, Folinic and Suzuran encounter Mudrock, who had come to offer flowers. Everyone hoped to prevent this, but nobody could do anything.

attributes.content: Mudrock, they're hunting down the last fugitives.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They could have just left the fugitives to fend for themselves in the mountains. Capturing them will save their lives.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I can't tell if they're being cruel or kind.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The ones who didn't follow us are not our problem, but...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Try to avoid the search parties. We need to get out of here before winter.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's already cold.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And go where?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We've been wandering for so long. Where does it end? It definitely won't end well.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Then, let's go home.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We go back and find a quiet patch of woods. And we survive.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What about our fight?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: For now... we live.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: To live, just to live, we are fighting the world every day.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We're going home? To what home?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: But what about us? We're not Sarkaz. That's...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You are companions of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: There may be no place for Sarkaz outside of Kazdel. But in Kazdel, there is a place for you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Not because of tolerance. But because there is... nothing there.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Kazdel... is not a city. Not a country. Technically, it is just a region.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: A land of exiles where we are not allowed to build homes.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Kazdel... is where the homeless go. A land of rootless people.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It is where you belong.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Maybe we can live in peace in Kazdel. It's full of Infected Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Leithania's leniency toward the Infected is ultimately just a product of the popularity of bloodlines and Originium Arts. It doesn't mean they truly accept you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: As soon as the mask came off, the very first to be ostracized were still the Infected.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It's not just Oripathy. This rich country has forgotten all the depressed corners of our world.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: A tragedy like Wolumonde's is just a mild annoyance for the aristocrats. It's a topic of conversation for the bankers and court artists at tea time.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We can't accept it. We won't.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: So we leave. We'll go to Kazdel. Let's see your hometown.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Will Leithania come after us?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Maybe. Regardless of what happened before, a group of Infected Sarkaz showed up and destroyed a town. Piss-poor optics.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Severin knows the truth. Would he try to frame us?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: He would.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's just the way he does things. Based on the information he has, he will do what causes the least amount of damage to his town.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Then we have to get out of here quickly, or all of Leithania is going to come down on us.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Yes. So we must figure out a route soon... Oh...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Sorry. Wait a moment. I have to go somewhere.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Very quick.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So that's where you were.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Operator Folinic.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No, don't get up. I won't get too close to you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're waiting for someone, aren't you?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I wasn't on the Rhodes Island landship when the Reunion incident happened. You... changed a lot.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're very different from what the rumors say about you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Rumors?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I heard you fought alongside an elite operator to solve a lot of the problems in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...a big, dumb, reckless cat who gets blood everywhere.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: And we weren't able to solve... anything.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I have to thank you again. I don't know how things would have turned out without you and Lisa.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, Severin, even Reunion. No one wanted it to come to this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Everyone was fighting to stop the tragedy, but we were powerless.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Atro, she...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Don't push yourself to mourn anything or anyone. It's over now.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Just pray for the dead to rest in peace.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We failed to bring the killer to justice. Not only that, we failed to protect the town Atro gave her life for.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She would have blamed me, wouldn't she?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Only you would blame yourself. Atro was a cheerful, open-minded woman.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: She would slap you on the shoulder and get drunk with you.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Heh... you're right. Seems like you knew her well?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know a certain 'elite operator' she liked to get drunk with.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We're not the only ones who have given up on chasing all this.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: You came.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Here, freshly picked wildflowers...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You should be aware of the situation at hand. The cleanup mission is nearing completion and Rhodes Island will be leaving the area soon to try to contact Resource Dispatch for assistance.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But when that happens...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No one will speak for us. I know.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I don't blame Severin. This is the only thing he can tell the nobles, or his people will be the ones to suffer.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We too will leave here soon. It's just that, some of our people died here... I don't want to leave without saying goodbye.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...Eight Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But not, the number of casualties in Wolumonde is hundreds of times greater than that.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No... it's not your fault. I wasn't blaming you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm just reflecting on it. Thinking about how it came to this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Of course, I know the world is not fair. Good things don't come to good people. But also... rarely have I ever seen such self-destructiveness.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Fomented anger and lust for revenge nearly destroyed everything... even me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're still blaming yourself.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No... I've calmed down past that. I'm only reevaluating, maybe what I thought was 'done wrong' just 'couldn't be done.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Everything from Rhodes Island, everything Dr. Kal'tsit taught me... I just couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No one could.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I stopped them from crossing the line, but one or two stops can't quench their vengeful rage.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So... things are the way they are.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What are you going to do next? 'Reunion' is still a big problem for many people. You should let go of that symbol.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: You're right. But 'Reunion' is not dead. And this news has spread among the Infected in Leithania.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The fire of resistance continues to burn... twisted and distorted as it is. We must take a moment to catch our breaths.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: There are too many in my squad with no combat experience. I can't decide their fate. They... perhaps they just want to live in peace.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Say... Rhodes Island, have you ever heard the name 'Big Bob?'
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If there's a connection, I could search the archives.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No. There isn't. He's just a friend of mine...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Reunion? Or Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Reunion. He is an experienced bounty hunter.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They are not warriors, so they had a reason to get out... They should free themselves from oppression and seek a place for themselves among the Columbian pioneers.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Ah, come to think of it, they have hops.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Have you ever seen hops? How does it work? You crush it up into beer?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Um, it's a fine plant... it has something to do with the beer foam. Um, I think it prolongs the antiseptic—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No. I don't really have to explain this, do I? I'm not that familiar with it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let's just say, it's very handy.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I see. Lucky.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hops... foam... beer...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hey, don't get lost thinking about beer. We're still enemies here.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We may never be able to bridge our differences.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Oh... sorry.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We are warriors. Sarkaz are warriors.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I have to say... it's hard to feel your warrior spirit from your words and actions.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We had no choice.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If we have any demands, any convictions, anything to protect, we can only fight.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: There are other ways to solve problems.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Then... what of our fallen companions? If we stand peacefully, will the murderers open their homes and cities to us?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They won't.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We can only fight on... to help our fellow Infected.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: 'Our fellow Infected.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Kazdel is not a good place.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We're not good guys, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Any real 'good place' is closed to us.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You have another choice, Mudrock.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No. Not now.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: These Leithaniens, these Sarkaz, they all have their own ideas.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The resentment is still there. Nothing has made it easier to trust each other. Only the will to live as one ever held them all together. That was the only bond.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: How sad.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No, Rhodes Island Swallow. Maybe we'll see each other again someday... to fight for the Infected.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You're not the first one from Reunion to call me that.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Is that so...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: After I leave here, we are, as before, enemies.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Otherwise, Leithania will suspect you. And you won't have an explanation.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So... don't get too close to your enemy.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I came only to offer a bouquet. And I did. So... it's time to go.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Good luck.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If you have anything else to say, now is the time.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I feel like I've been living a nightmare. And watching him walk away, it's like finally waking up.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It's... over.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm not very good at comforting people, but—
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I know you're not the one who should be comforting me. Sorry.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We just have to let go of the grief. It's not a good thing. It's a compromise that lets us keep living.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: How long did it take you to come to terms with it?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A long time. Long enough to lose even more.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We go back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We... take Atro home.
attributes.name: Folinic
